item.description:
Merrie Buchsbaum has had an extraordinary life. She began as an art teacher, started the team building programs for more than 1,000 children at the Paul Newman’s Hole in the Wall camps, is an accomplished jeweler, with her pieces featured at the Smithsonian, and is currently dedicated to family health and nutritional excellence. Merrie is excited to share her journey, and prepare some healthy munchies for us! Join us for a fun filled and inspirational morning!

“Defining Moments and following my passions has provided me an extraordinary entrepreneurial life. Come listen to my story, be inspired to listen to your inner voice and learn some healthy tips to change your lifestyle. I am passionate about helping others achieve their optimal health and having them establish a dietary lifestyle that is triumphant and sustainable for life.”
item.name: Merrie Buchsbaum, founder of Family Nutrution for Life Presents: "Defining Momen
